/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees on both sides. The trees, standing tall and proud, add a touch of green to the otherwise urban landscape. A few cars can be seen parked along the side of the road, hinting at the life and activity in this part of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. The perspective of the image is from the middle of the street, looking down its length, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
